text: @ReneeYoungWWE Quitting WWE as @VinceMcMahon Don't Respect WWE Superstars lives & Forced them to Work Amidst #CoronavirusPandemic  @TripleH hasn't Given any Assurances to WWE Superstars if they get Infected with #coronavirus Infected Wrestlers Are Forsaken by WWE.
